DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the effectivity of the new thyroid fine needle aspiration biopsy (FNAB) apparatus of which patented from Turkish Patent Institute.
DOC.brief_title: New Thyroid Fine Needle Aspiration Biopsy Apparatus
DOC.detailed_description: The author group of this investigation produced a new thyroid fine needle aspiration biopsy (FNAB) apparatus and patented it from Turkish patent Institute. FNAB indicated nodular goitre patients are the subjects of this research. First, the investigators will perform standart FNAB after this procedure will perform FNAB with new apparatus. The investigators will evaluate the aspirates according to number of cells and malignity ratio of cells.
DOC.criteria: fine needle aspiration biopsy indicated noduler goiter patients diffuse goiter
